publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1616 Donald Gorrie: Bus Services to New Parliament Buildingâ€”That the Parliament, in the absence of any bus service connecting Princes Street or Waverley Station to the new parliament building, any prospect of one or of an improved walking route, calls on the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body urgently to arrange for a shuttle bus service, using an appropriate small or medium size of bus, to run between Waverley Station and the Parliament to facilitate the use of train and bus services by MSPs, staff and visitors to the Parliament, using one of the available routes, such as Waverley Bridge, Market Street, New Street, Calton Road, Canongate and back via New Street and Market Street or via North Bridge and Princes Street.
S2M-1616 Bus Services to New Parliament Building (lodged on 18 August 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1616 Bus Services to New Parliament Building (lodged on 18 August 2004) Alex Neil*, Chris Ballance*, Rob Gibson*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-1616 Bus Services to New Parliament Building (lodged on 18 August 2004) Shiona Baird*, Robin Harper*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Eleanor Scott*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-1616 Bus Services to New Parliament Building (lodged on 18 August 2004) Iain Smith*
S2M-1616 Bus Services to New Parliament Building (lodged on 18 August 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1616 Bus Services to New Parliament Building (lodged on 18 August 2004) Elaine Smith*
